comment.author: 37381115@N04
comment._content: Everybody is spesial! Mr. Ole Olsen was a norwegian composer and conductor from Hammerfest and a friend of Edward Grieg. If you want to know more about him look here: snl.no/.nbl_biografi/Ole_Olsen/utdypning
